ygData.subject: Re: Leatherskin spell
ygData.msgSnippet: What is a diference from a leatherskeen to steel skeen? i heared that leather is 150 dmg and steal 175 but only 25 hit points dont look to much at so high lv
ygData.messageBody:
What is a diference from a leatherskeen to steel skeen? i heared that
leather is 150 dmg and steal 175 but only 25 hit points dont look to much
at so high lv MOBs hit for more then 70 a hit and hit 2 or 3 times in round.

I use a leather all time when soloing, less in group i dont cast it only if
im absolutly sure that nothing dangerus can pass by as i fight mobs wich
can give 1 or 2 plat a kill it is realy not a problem of money if root hold
i can kill 2 or 3 before i need to recast leatherskeen and in that time i
get some 2 plat. so i get at minimum 1 plat counting time to go in shop to
buy a gems wich i have all time in bunch of 40 pc on me.

And im glad to spend this money for a 30 - 40 times it saves my life.



At 18.43 06/09/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "shypht" <evanschu@...>
>
>I didnt find shieldskin to be of much use. and I mainly only used
>leatherskin when soloing. But
>once I got steelskin, I used that spell like crack, I allways have it on me
>and find it to be VERY
>usefull.
>
>
